tools module¶

tools.MSE(yhat, y)¶

This function calculates the mean squared error between a predicted and target vector.

yhatnumpy array

The predicted, approximated, or calculated vector

ynumpy array

The target vector

msefloat

The mean squared error between yhat and y.

CAIRO
